website_summaries.verdict: Thanks to its numerous features and affordable price, the few known issues don't stop this sleek trash can from being the top value on our list.
pros: Has all the features of costlier models and more – quiet operation, 4 D battery/electric operation, highly accurate Reflx sensor, and attentive customer support
cons: Sensor has been known to malfunction after a few months of use
Battery life is limited and the AC adapter is a separate purchase

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT.  Fits a ton of trash in an attractive trashcan!
customer_reviews.text: I've waited almost a year to write this review because I wanted to be sure this product was long-lasting. We have a tiny kitchen in our beach house and a tiny and weirdly shaped space for a trash can. I researched FOREVER (just ask my husband) and finally settled on this one. It fits perfectly in the space and has surpassed my expectations in every way. It's attractive and fits a TON of trash in a very discreet way. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Loud

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have only had these cans over a month and they are great! They hold so much trash. I used to have to throw out the trash daily. These trash cans hold two days worth of trash. I purchased the stickers separately on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: linda vasquez

customer_reviews.title: It’s a garbage can but I LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: I know it’s a garbage can but I LOVE it. I bought 2 - one for trash and one for recycling. I love the squarer shape and can fit both side by side in my kitchen. It has totally helped my family actually recycle having it so conveniently located. (Yes they’re lazy.) The step cans never lasted in our house - always breaking so the automatic lids are great! The plug is a nice option but I don’t have an outlet near the cans so I use batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Renee S.

customer_reviews.title: I love this trash can!
customer_reviews.text: I waited to review to make sure it works. After having a cheap plastic can with a lid that wouldn't stay shut for weeks I broke down and ordered this. It works. I just hold whatever is getting tossed over it and it opens. It also closes when you are done! The bad reviews about the bags slipping in are user error. Read the directions and install the bags properly with the ring ! Update: It is about 5 months later and I still have not had to replace the batteries! And I open and close this can A LOT! Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: GdownTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not turning on!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this trash can with A.C. adaptor and it's not even turning on!!! I am so disappointed!!! Update ( 1 week lator) I contacted the customer service and they replied fast. They sent me a new lid with adaptor and now It's working. I am really happy with both customer service and trash can.
customer_reviews.author: banafsheh

customer_reviews.title: The batteries and deodorizer sit in your contaminated trash
customer_reviews.text: Very poor design. The batteries and deodorizer sit in your trash because they are not in the lid but below the trash level. As you toss any wet trash in it hits these and your lid will always be disgusting and bacteria contaminated. I have never seen a trash can designed with a component that sits in the trash itself. Expect to clean the lid every time you take out the trash. Pretty gross. I would not buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: Well, I should've listened to other reviews but I had high hopes. This trash can broke after about 3 months of owning it. The lid does not close all the way unless you sit there, wait for about 15 seconds, and then push the close button multiple times. As a result, our kitchen always smells like trash because the thing never closes itself. Don't waste your money on this. I now have a trash can that doesn't close, a kitchen that always stinks, and a bunch of filters that I paid for that are worthless to me since I have to replace this trash can. Beyond disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: BEST TRASH CAN EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought a trashcan could make me so happy! My pet peeve; when trashcan lids are gross or have greasy prints on them. This trashcan solved just that. I purchased the can with the adapter and it works beautifully. Not only is this functional but it looks great in my kitchen too. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Wells FamilyTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Just Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work. I tired this trash can twice because I liked it so much. It's the perfect size for our home and we've had iTouch cans before in our old home. But the first one we got stopped working within 24 hours. Of course Amazon is great about customer service and sent us a replacement. I'm glad we were within the time to send it back before this thing died. Too bad. Not going to try it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amongst the Living

customer_reviews.title: Just doesn't work over time
customer_reviews.text: It just doesn't respond over time. I have the AC adapter and after awhile it just doesn't open fully - which defeats the whole purpose of it. I'll just end paying for a cheaper can in the end. Very poor.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Peck

customer_reviews.title: Great size for small household
customer_reviews.text: Nice stainless steel trash can. The size is good for a small household. It powered batter or ac adapter. 4 stars because I thought the adapter is coming along with the trash can but it doesn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Bungheng

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!
customer_reviews.text: After about a month with it we give it 5 stars. Works perfectly, you figure out pretty quickly what motions open the lid. designed so typical kitchen bags are filled completely before needing emptying. Love the touch-free and the fact top closes tightly afterwards..no odors unlike the under counter one we had previously used. Update: 6 months in and still love it. Bought it for the convenience, but noticed can hold much more than plastic trash receptacles can because you can compress trash into it with its rigid metal sides. Other advantages: tops seals nicely when closed, so no odors, batteries last a long time...haven’t needed to replace yet! 18 month update: still love it! Looks and works great.
customer_reviews.author: IMFLYIN

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: I loved this trash can when I first got it. However, it would open everytime i walked by and wouldnt stay open long enough for me to clean off my cutting board or such activities. The top closes on your hand which would hurt my 2 year old who throws away his trash. The opening is small so it was impossible to use the lid when emptying out my vacuum without making a mess. What made this rating so low though was that we had only used the trashcan for about 3 months and the motor burnt out. Would not buy again or recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: My cat hasn't figured how to get into it.
customer_reviews.text: Opens only when needed, very attractive design, and the best part carbon filer absorbs garbage order, doesn't cover up with strong scents.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: After reading an extensive amount of reviews, I decided to give this trash a try.. and I'm so glad we did. It is sleek, compact and fit perfectly in our kitchen. Despite the "compact" design, it fits a ton of trash. We installed batteries to eliminate cords and it's worked out perfectly. I don't have any complaints with the sensor. The lid opens and closes quietly. My kids love it too. (Motivates them to clean up after themselves) Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Ibarra

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy this. Worked for a week and hasn’t worked since. Have to manually open the lid - defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: dndjsjsjn

customer_reviews.title: The sensor is great and if you want
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I'd actually be excited about a trash can. I've had it for a few weeks now and it still amazes me. The sensor is great and if you want, there's a manual open/close button. Material is good quality. The only downside is you have to purchase the power adapter separately if you choose not to use batteries. Other than that it's amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great!! Top opens and shuts no problem. Also a feature to stay open if standing onn front of"electric eye" for peeling veggies etc .. very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Connie

customer_reviews.title: I use them both with the power brick and absolutely love them! I don't worry too much about the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these iTouchless trash cans...one's a slightly different model. I use them both with the power brick and absolutely love them! I don't worry too much about the carbon filter, because I use Glad OdorShield trash bags
customer_reviews.author: I. U. Boi

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this garbage can. The sleek design paired with the electric opening and the fact that I no longer feel the need to hide my garbage can makes life so much nicer. The fact that the smell is contained is wonderful and although it doesn't seem like it the size is perfect. I feel like this company gave me a very reasonable price for what they provided and I would for sure purchase again and recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Keyes

customer_reviews.title: Product works great. Opens fast
customer_reviews.text: Product works great. Opens fast, looks nice. I had to receive a new AC adapter through customer service, they were very attentive and had it out for deliver for the same day.
customer_reviews.author: ALawson

customer_reviews.title: Great trashcan
customer_reviews.text: I really dislike how it didn't come with an adapter. I get that it doesn't come with batteries but does have the option so you can go full wireless, but how can you get what you want with no power source? The sensor is good and responsive even with the light off impressively. I bought it for the kitchen and my whole family seemed to adapt to it since it's an everyday use object. I love the modern world and this is definitely a must have to make life that much better.
customer_reviews.author: Mario A Rordriguez

customer_reviews.title: Buy one-you’re wlecome
customer_reviews.text: This sounds so silly, but this trash can has changed my life! I no longer have to open the trash can-it literally has saved my hands from germs. Best thing ever! In fact, whenever I go to a normal persons house I am perplexed when the can isn’t automatic. Who still uses manual cans?
customer_reviews.author: Kane

customer_reviews.title: As a kitchen garbage can, I really like its design
customer_reviews.text: As a kitchen garbage can, I really like its design, especially its compact "footprint". But, the electronics of the self-opening/closing feature stopped working -- entirely -- within three weeks.
customer_reviews.author: DickB19

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: Once I learned the spot to put my hand it opens 95% of the time first try. Also, the lid pops open fast for me even on the D-cell batteries. However, it does seem to have a mess detector -- If something is dripping and messy and you are in a hurry to get it into the trash THEN then lid won’t open until you wave your hands around! ;) It looks very nice in my kitchen as well. While not perfect I like it and I am glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed and looks cheap - would avoid
customer_reviews.text: This trash can is poorly designed. It requires unscrewing 4 small screws to put in a battery (as opposed to having the battery comparentment just pop out - i don't want to have to unscrew this thing every 3 months) and it's about 6 inches too short to properly fit a 13 gallon trash bag. The metal and buttons also look cheap. For $64, I think the manufacturer can make something that looks nicer. I'm disappointed with this product and would avoid buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I like the fact that the lid doesn’t slam your hand. I only had it for over a month and it is better than my previous one (different brand). It’s kinda narrow but it holds enough and the trash bag doesn’t overflow. The sensor is great. No issues. It looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy

customer_reviews.title: works as advertised and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! I had previously purchased a Ninestars garbage sensor pail which quit working within 9 months of purchase. I attempted to contact Ninestars by phone and was unsuccessful. They refused to take responsibility for their inadequate product so I purchased this pail after researching the reviews. This pail is beautiful and works beautifully. It looks nice in my kitchen. It came with the adaptor plug so doesn't need batteries. Please don't waste your money on the Ninestars pail. This is the way to go!
customer_reviews.author: Lori G

customer_reviews.title: Classy!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first type of this can I have ever owned. It arrived intact and works perfect. The opening is large. I have always used the easy draw tight type bags in all my old "normal" cans. But that style is difficult to get around the ring (first) then which you drop into this can. This a GOOD thing. I plan to go back to the doggie ear/flap non draw string type bags now. Which are cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Cicon

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Good purchase and not disappointed so far
customer_reviews.text: 2.5 months in in a 2 person household and it's still on its first set of Amazon basic D size batteries. Works great. Good purchase and not disappointed so far. **edit** I'm now 4 months in with this trash can. Same set of Amazon basic batteries. Cats still haven't figured out how to open it. Very very happy with this purchase. ***edit***march 10, 2020. Same set of batteries. Same trash can, and the same cats still haven't figured out how to open it. Have also had it fool foster dogs, and family members over for the holidays. Love this trashcan. 15/10 would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Erin B.

customer_reviews.title: Bought in Feb, stopped working in Sept
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my elderly mom living in an apartment because the size was perfect. I purchased it in Feb and in Sept it stopped working. I have the plug in kind so don't tell me I need to replace the batteries. It's not well made. Also it is a pain to change out the garbage bag with a stupid flange inside. My elderly mom does not need to be messing with that. I can't see how this is so highly rated by others. It is garbage. Not a garbage can, but garbage itself.
customer_reviews.author: kitten mommy

customer_reviews.title: Missing power cord
customer_reviews.text: Really like the trash can and like that it is touchless. It fits great in my kitchen. I did not however receive the power cord that the card that came with the trash can says was included in the package. Not sure how to contact whoever it is i need to contact to receive the missing piece..
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Krauss

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.text: I love how useful it is with the automatic opening and closing, never having to touch the lid with messy hands. I like how it looks matching the appliances and having a sleek design.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Coutcher

customer_reviews.title: Nice size and work well so far
customer_reviews.text: This was the third or fourth trash can we tried, even after reading reviews before purchasing the others. This has been by far the best. The trash bags fit hidden inside. The sensors are appropriately sensitive. I really like the shape - some are so wide, but these work well next to each other. (We bought one for trash, another for recycles.) We haven't tried the deodorizer yet (I've never needed/had such a thing for a trash can before). It's been stinky a couple of times, but I don't think that has anything to do with the can - we just took the trash out. So far, they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and functional
customer_reviews.text: The sleek appearance looks great in our kitchen with our stainless appliances and the touchless feature keeps fingerprints and mess off of the can. The sensitive is just right so it only opens when you intend it to open and not just when you walk by. No complaints thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Meets Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I like the Durability and quality. There are no dislikes. There are no information on replacement or where to purchase deodorize filters.
customer_reviews.author: Excited

customer_reviews.title: Not dog proof!  Stopped working after 1 week.
customer_reviews.text: Not dog proof. Yes, you can lock the lid flap, but my dog was able to easily topple the top heavy garbage can and remove the lid. It took 4 days for our dog to get into this trash can. I find the trash can annoying to use and prefer the step on trash can, but purchased this one based on recommendations. Maybe this would be effective for a small dog, but not for a dog of even 40 pounds. One week later the trash can has stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Why is this a 5 star item when it don’t work got a new one and ain’t working and don’t come with cord so extra money waste of money for sure
customer_reviews.author: eduardo

customer_reviews.title: you must order the ac adapter
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure about the quality of this product as I returned it immediately. I was told that the ad was clear that there was no ac adapter and that you had to buy it separately. I had to scroll to the bottom to find that information. Not sure why it has to be sold separately, you can not operate this without it. Was super disappointed. AND I had to pay to return it. I consider that poor customer service.
customer_reviews.author: angie garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great garbage pail for home chefs!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this trash can!! So convenient when preparing a meal. Automatic lift allows you to toss potato peels, scraps, etc without touching the garbage pail. I have purchased three of these (one for each of my kitchens and one as a gift).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and SO far works great
customer_reviews.text: Had to send the first one back as there was a small dent in the side corner of it. Frankly was well as it was protected with both foam and foam plastic bag inside a box that had no dents in it I can't figure out how the dent happened. Second unit came in OK and have been using it for a week or so. I got it to keep prying noses out of the garbage. Works great so far it has the added perk of scaring the dogs when that lid close after a few seconds. They are NOT going near it as it must be haunted.
customer_reviews.author: James R.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but came dented twice.
customer_reviews.text: I'm rating a 4 star, because it is a very nice trash can. Works well. Love the compact size, look and feel. HOW EVER, this is the 2nd one I received from an exchange due to a side dent on the metal. They did promptly exchange a new one for me, but this one too, had a dent similar to the same area. Not sure if it's during shipment or manufacture packaging. But very disappointed. I decided to keep it because I'm tired of exchanging. So to the seller, I hope you're aware of this issue. Wish I can get the A.C. adapter for free, for my troubles. Over all, I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lani37

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: When I connected the adapter it didn't work. I thought maybe the adapter is not working. I bought the batteries and made sure I got the correct ones, the minute I inserted them the trash can became very hot and smoke emitted from the top!!!!! I quickly removed the batteries but I don't recommend this to anyone, waste of money. I emailed the seller about this incident and got no response.
customer_reviews.author: Fayrose Abodeshisha

customer_reviews.title: I have been using it for about 2 weeks and it has performed fantastic and every time
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the itouch stainless steel trash can to match our refrigerator and stove bot in stainless steel and I ordered the wall pack as there is a power outlet near it. I have been using it for about 2 weeks and it has performed fantastic and every time. The looks of it match all our applinces and it has a no finger print finish. Great trash can for the high tech home I would recommend this trash can to everyone great product.
customer_reviews.author: LRay E.

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it says!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome trash can!!! We love it! It is so quiet, looks sharp and the trash bags are very easy to remove when full from the can, unlike our older trash can. I can't believe how great it is to wave my hand over the can and it opens! This can holds a lot of trash, much more than it appears. The odor filters work well, too. Would definitely recommend this trash can to others. For the money it can't be beat!!! Would order from this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

customer_reviews.title: I can't describe how much I love this garbage can
customer_reviews.text: I can't describe how much I love this garbage can! It has made my kitchen so much nicer. When I got it, it was smaller than I excepted, and worried I would be taking out the garbage more often. However, it seems to hold as much as my old trash bin and I take it out much less fequently because you can't smell anything when the lid is closed! It seems like such a funny thing to be excited about, but my roommate and I LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: Convenient self opening can and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Love this trash can. It's so much cleaner to have the lid open by itself. No touching trash can lid when you're cooking. The description says it's a 13 gallon size but seems a bit smaller than that. Bags don't fill completely but that's really not an issue. I was concerned about battery life but I've had the same set of batteries in for 5 months now so no real need to buy an adapter for it.
customer_reviews.author: Beagle Dad

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Impressive to my guest when they see how ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Impressive to my guest when they see how it works Wish i got the charger but the batteries work great
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Its sleek looking and I like the size of it
customer_reviews.text: It's so convenient to have the can open when you have things in your hands. I did have to face it in a different direction because it kept opening everytime I went by it. I use the large batteries because I wasn't crazy about the look of having it plugged in. Its sleek looking and I like the size of it.
customer_reviews.author: kvdgb

customer_reviews.title: Can is nice and touchless feature works
customer_reviews.text: Kind of wish i purchased the next size larger. Can is nice and touchless feature works well
customer_reviews.author: John s laney

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for several years now and it always works as expected. The batteries have only been changed twice. The only time I notice a smell is when I have put food in it and it needs to be changed. And I only notice the smell when I open it to add other things! It is also a fun conversation starter when guests try to use it for the first time and look for a foot pedal or handle.
customer_reviews.author: DLM

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this can it holds no order and is the perfect size
customer_reviews.author: Monique Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived without defects. East to set up. Works as advertised. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Chatelain

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love My Trash Can
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice looking trash can. Very easy to set up. The touchless automatic function works like a charm. I use it for my kitchen trash and I am going to buy another one for my recycle trash.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Wensil

customer_reviews.title: Finally a secure trash can!
customer_reviews.text: We found the solution! My dog can no longer get in the trash. We tried turning our old can around. She still got in it. Locking lids were a pain because sometimes our hands were full of trash. This is the perfect solution!! It’s worth every penny and I wish we’d found this before our last disaster. As you can see from my video, it opens easily but sometimes there’s a slight delay. You can also open and close with the touch of a button if the sensor is being picky.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great with no more buying batteries
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. I used to go through batteries with others but I bought the AC adapter with this one so I am hoping that issue is done, though it will take batteries if you do not have an outlet nearby. Sensor works well and the bags are easy to fit in the container.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, clean trash can!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I thought of getting an automatic garbage when we went to my brothers house and they were using the same one. Very satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MountainMa’am

customer_reviews.title: Super Small but nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice trash can but way smaller than I had expected. It’s too big to be a bathroom trash can but too small for a kitchen. I live with two other people so it fills immediately. I’m also disappointed that it doesn’t come with the batteries. For $65 I’d assume everything would be taken care of for our first use especially since it requires D batteries and those aren’t things people usually have on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Happy about purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient, nice to put stuff in trash without having to touch trash can
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. For the price its fantastic. I like the square shape. I can fit a lot into it.
customer_reviews.author: April Saggio

customer_reviews.title: Great value, works as described
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, works as described. Only thing that i am anxious about is my old stainless manual can had a inner bin that was removable that the liner went in so curious to see how this one works out but hey, for 50 bucks i am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: very quiet and compact
customer_reviews.text: The lid is very quiet when it opens and closes and it takes up very little space.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Anderton

customer_reviews.title: Sadly, back in the market for a new trash can
customer_reviews.text: We have had ours less than 4 months and have not been able to stop it from breeding and attracting flies. It started with the sent filter canister becoming infested. We abandon that after a couple days. Ever since, there have been houseflies and fruit flies coming in and out of the lid. If it were airtight, perhaps we would have less of a problem. Sadly, back in the market for a new trash can
customer_reviews.author: ROC

customer_reviews.title: Becarfull !!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the design and the size. Everything about this trash can was awesome. The only thing is that it doesn’t work like it said it would. I have replaced the batteries twice, but it still does not open automatically. Then I brought the charger the light started working ,but still no auto open or close. So I gave up and kept it as a regular trash can.
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN BRATCHER

customer_reviews.title: 3 Years later and it's still great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this can 3 years so and it's still works great. The battery life is long and the can just works great. I'm back to buy another one for a different room.
customer_reviews.author: SouthernGirlNJ

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Really like the concept and not expensive. Wish filters lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: 1 year Warranty that comes with the product purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Now I have to say that at first I was upset and was going to give a low score but this product comes with a 1 year warranty and that means alot. My lid broke at 8 months of heavy use and they said they were going to ship another one out within a week. I'm giving a 4 right now with the expectaion that in a week ill be changing it to a 5 and doing the Happy Dance!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Sleek design. Great to see in kitchen but weak when you actually need to use. Sluggish lid opening when you are in a hurry. Mine fell over, warped and we could never get it straight again. After an hour+ of work by two different people, we gave up. The trash can is now trash.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Really liked this product until...
customer_reviews.text: We have enjoyed using our iTouchless 13 gal kitchen garbage can. I’ve had it since February and it is working flawlessly...however, in the past two weeks the outside is deteriorating due to RUST eating up the outside to the point of bubbles of rust indicating the base material is rusting and eating its way out. Will have to contact iTouchless and see how that goes...will post a follow up after contacting iTouchless. Update post customer service contact: The warranty does not cover rust. They are sorry it happened but I should try to “wipe it down with terpentine”...5 months until it rusted out, save your money and buy elsewhere. I also added a pic taken this am...
customer_reviews.author: bbgolfb

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Requires D batteries. Had for a month and still haven't had to change batteries. Easy to use, just wave over the can and it opens. Push the open button and it stays open longer. Has a charcoal filter to help keeps smells down, not sure how much it helps but its not very smelly so far. nice size for kitchen trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Davis

customer_reviews.title: Slim but holds a lot
customer_reviews.text: Slim but we love it. Works great and seems like it will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last year in sept. I thought it was a great purchase. I was very wrong!! It is already broken, the lid won't open. I had it just over a year and of course it only has a one year warranty per customer service. I didn't abuse or over use the trash can. So beaware that it will probably last for only 1 year and then break. What a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: erin C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun trash can!! My husband gets annoyed by it , but I like it!!
customer_reviews.author: Sue S.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. it worked great for about 2 months then stopped automatically opening. About 3 days later it started working again. Now it will work a few days correctly then stops opening and closing, then it starts again. Spent too much money for the product to malfunction so frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Mariam

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I looked for several weeks for a stainless steel trashcan and could not find one I liked. After searching on amazon the itouchless 13 gallon looked like what I was looking for so I ordered it. It has definitely met my expectations and works great! Holds more than I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: Anita White

customer_reviews.title: does not come with an adapter/power supply !!
customer_reviews.text: pretty good garbage can! works as described. I would have gladly paid an extra 10 dollars if they included a power supply. however it does mention that in the description. so be aware you will have to buy 4 D size batteries for it, which will run you an additional 12 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed that after 6 months this stopped working. The lid no longer responds. Batteries are brand new and it uses the adapter. It worked well for those 6 months until it just completely stopped reacting. Won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Griselda

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: The best garbage container, perfect size for tall bags, works perfectly, I would suggest you purchase the plug, so happy I found it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: I love it! It works great
customer_reviews.text: I love it ! It works great! I cook often and it is just so simple when hands are messy to just wave and keep counters organized.
customer_reviews.author: Starz

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, just as it is described. I'm glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Marc G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's just the perfect size in our kitchen, looks good and works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Schwieterman

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. It holds a lot and has worked well so far. I haven’t had to change batteries. I like the touchless kid. I use regular trash bags from Costco.
customer_reviews.author: Ruffin Morgan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! It's attractive, and iTouchless (being touchless, that is), is nice!
customer_reviews.author: Marla

customer_reviews.title: Works as Intended!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this trash can for about a two months now, and it works as intended. I initially purchased it because we started seeing roaches in our kitchen after the tenant in the neighboring apartment moved out. I wanted something covered that would keep the trash and smell contained. It definitely does the job. The automatic open/close feature helps keep the outside of the can sanitary, as well, since you don't ever have to touch any part of it. I had hoped this would also be helpful in keeping the dog out of the garbage as well, but my dog is the perfect height to activate the sensor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Touchless works great
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and packaging was perfect. So far so good, enjoying the touchless feature as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Colburn aka Sm00thM0nkey

customer_reviews.title: My fellow OCD people...you will love this!
customer_reviews.text: Makes life easier. Has great response time. I do feel it should come with a plug. Even though you can put batteries in it to operate, which is what I use for it. The manufacturer should provide the outlet as well, instead of the customer having to buy that separately.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Fancy Can
customer_reviews.text: It feels like I warpped into the future. Automatic feature works well. Had to tell the kids to stop playing w it.
customer_reviews.author: Jae

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product. Now can have my hands full and ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Now can have my hands full and can toss out all the garbage. Only one issue: the plastic that wraps around the base of this unit does gradually break off. It happened on both pails so
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Batteries last a long time. Would give it 5 stars but sometimes the lid pops off the can by itself and it's kind of hard to put it back on. Other than that it's a great product. Well after 4 month's the lid has to be opened manually. I cleaned it up real good and put brand new batteries and still wont work anymore. Don't believe I would recommend this now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware of cheap product!!! and very short warranty!!!
customer_reviews.text: The operation of this unit worked less than 2 months... the plastic hinge on the lid broke, making it useless as a touchless trash can... the mechanism still works but the cheap plastic wont stay together for the simple movement of opener... I tried to glue the piece back together but it unfortunately broke after a day of use... I was totally surprised to find that it is only warranted for 1 month... Guess I should have read the fine print... Certainly not worth the money spent for a non-quality unit....
customer_reviews.author: Michael Walls

customer_reviews.title: Great for Ped Food Storage!!!
customer_reviews.text: This can works great....I actually store a large bag of dog food in it and I can walk up to the can with the bowls and I can fill them without having to put everything down to open it! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Spears

customer_reviews.title: Automatic for the price of a regular can.
customer_reviews.text: This is so cool. The thing I liked the most is that it cost about the same as a Walmart regular non-automatic can. It didn't work all the time with batteries but I use a universal power supply as it cost about the same as a year's worth of batteries. I believe that the batteries simply lost connection because they seems loose in the compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Starbanker

customer_reviews.title: Like that the roll on the can goes out instead ...
customer_reviews.text: It works well. Like that the roll on the can goes out instead of inward. I just got rid of one that went the opposite way because it was hard to remove the garbage bag. This works much better.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice product that is well made. It looks very nice in the kitchen and you never have to touch the trash can except when you replace the bags. Replacing bags is also easy and my wife loves that I am doing that part now. I have had this product for 9 months with no issues. I would highly recommend this product. Also, the seller was very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wronski

customer_reviews.title: It is a wonderful product- 1) I was worried about the motion sensor ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a wonderful product- 1) I was worried about the motion sensor causing the lid or open and close due to random movements around it- NOPE. The motion sensor is set with a close proximity, so it only opens when you intentionally waive your hand about an 1" above the lid. Perfect! 2) Then entire lid flips open so I don't have to worry about accidentally spilling something on the side. 3) Deodorizer works...I know I have since experiments happening in my trashcan for the last two days, but I can't smell it! Again...PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: ghalib manjurr

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to set-up and it's working great so far
customer_reviews.text: We only received this today, but I was very impressed by how well the can was packaged. It was easy to set-up and it's working great so far. My husband, who was quite skeptical at buying a touchless, expensive trash can, is also very pleased with it. Hopefully, we'll continue to feel that way after several more days/weeks/months of use.
customer_reviews.author: NCMez

customer_reviews.title: Best touchless garbage can yet!
customer_reviews.text: I had a touchless garbage can before but somebody tried to force open the top or close it, and it broke. On the bright side, this one is even better and I put a post it note on the top to remind people they don't need to touch the can at all. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: RHGEDL

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: All I need to do is wave, and it opens; its filter also eliminates the usual odor trashcans give off. It's been great so far. I love the size and how it fits right in with rest of the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: SOOOOOOO Coooool
customer_reviews.text: OMG this is so cool especially for me who washes my hands so much while in the kitchen. It is magical. Just a wave of the hand.
customer_reviews.author: djf

customer_reviews.title: Works and it's convenient
customer_reviews.text: This has been one of my best purchases, works as described and extremely convenient to use. It has been a few months since we purchased and we have experienced zero problems and it does get a work out of open and close. Very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Santelia

product_meta.title: iTouchless 13 Gallon Stainless Steel Automatic Trash Can with Odor-Absorbing Filter and Lid Lock, Sensor Kitchen Garbage Bin, Power by Batteries (not included) or Optional AC Adapter (sold separately)
product_meta.description: Color:Black / Stainless SteelDon't just mask smelly garbage odors with fragrances and messy baking soda; eliminate them. The upgraded Dzt13 is now equipped with a carbon filter Gate (Cfg) that uses activated carbon to effectively eliminate and neutralize the toughest odors. Smelly and oversized garbage doesn't stand a chance with the upgraded 13 gallon touchless trash can. Its extra wide opening (11. 75 diagonal) allows disposal of larger debris and comes equipped with the most advanced infrared sensor technology on the market; opening the lid automatically when you approach within 6 inches, and closing It when you walk away. Thanks to the automatic lid closing system, The built-in carbon filter can work its magic; eliminating and neutralize nasty odors effectively. The pre-installed carbon filter Gate (Cfg) has a dimensional surface area, maximizing the deodorizer's odor-absorption capabilities. The deodorizer is NON-SCENTED and , making it safe for use around children and pets, providing you with a cleaner and fresher home. The deodorizer can fight odors for 3 months before needing replacement
feature_bullets: UNCONDITIONAL PROMISE – Your 100 percentage satisfaction is assured and backed by a Full-Service Manufacturer's Promise for two years, including Dedicated Customer Support (see user manual for details)
Control Odors – 1 Natural Carbon Odor Filter is included to absorb and neutralize trash odors, for a fresh and clean smelling home
Extra-Long Battery Life – Only draws power as needed. 3X battery life of other sensor cans. 4 D size batteries (not included) can last up to 1.5 years
11 Power Options – Powered by batteries (not included), or optional AC Adapter (sold separately, see other product variation) for battery-free power
Stainless Steel – Germ-resistant, fingerprint-proof surface is easy to clean. Modern design is perfect for any kitchen or office décor
Space and Money Saver – Efficient rectangular shape fits in tight spaces and corners. Fits common 13 Gal trash bags, no expensive custom bags required
Large Capacity – Efficient design requires no inner bucket, providing 25 percentage more capacity than similar cans. Extra-Wide 12" lid opening for bulky items
Premium Features – On/Off Lid Lock; Retainer Ring prevents bag falling in; Air Vents create air flow to ease bag removal; Non-Skid Base; Manual open/close buttons
